item.title: Dinner for nearly $15,000 — the cost of a meal with DBS bank CEO
item.description: A charity auction in Singapore featured a private dinner with DBS Group's first female CEO Tan Su Shan. The experience fetched a winning bid of over $...

item.title: JPMorgan can now help you find a private jet or butler
item.description: The move comes as private banks and wealth management firms seek to find ways of serving clients outside of core investing and financial advice.

item.title: Most of Elon Musk’s fortune now comes from his private companies
item.description: Together, Musk's stake in xAI and SpaceX are now worth nearly twice as much as his Tesla shares.

item.title: Luxury brands bet on $160 lipsticks and $1,400 accessories to combat industry slump
item.description: The diversification to attract new customers comes as the luxury sector grapples with an industry-wide slowdown, U.S. tariffs, and wider cost pressure...

item.title: Larry Ellison adds $100B to his net worth in 24 hours, biggest one day again in history
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on news regarding Oracle's Larry Ellison.
